item.title: 美联储投资组合中枢出台前货币市场压力犹存
item.description: 据华尔街分析师称，由于融资成本居高不下，货币市场的压力可能会持续到 11 月份，从而给美联储带来压力，迫使其在下个月停止缩减投资组合之前就增强流动性。【原文：Strains in money markets could persist into November as funding costs remain stubbornly high, building pressure for the Federal Reserve to bolster liquidity even before it stops shrinking its portfolio next month, according to Wall Street analysts.】

item.title: WhatsApp 推出苹果手表应用程序，提供语音信息和其他功能
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司旗下的流行信息服务 WhatsApp 推出了一款独立的 Apple Watch 应用程序，使用户可以更方便地通过苹果公司的智能手表与他们的聊天内容进行互动，而无需拿出 iPhone。【原文：WhatsApp, the popular messaging service owned by Meta Platforms Inc., introduced a standalone Apple Watch app that makes it easier for users to interact with their chats from Apple Inc.’s smartwatch without pulling out an iPhone.】

item.title: 经济负担能力问题使美国首次购房者年龄中位数升至 40 岁
item.description: 美国首次购房者的年龄中位数已攀升至创纪录的 40 岁，因为过去几年房价和抵押贷款利率的飙升推迟了数百万美国人拥有住房的时间。【原文：The median age of first-time homebuyers in the US has climbed to a record of 40 as soaring prices and mortgage rates over the last few years delay homeownership for millions of Americans.】
